note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the notes preceding Class F01, especially as regards the definition of "reaction type".
This subclass comprises: engines, other than of positive-displacement type, driven by liquids; machines, other than of positive-displacement type, for liquids.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.
